New Features: Introduced new color pickers with a reset option in the color picker menu
Integrated global chat for the friends tab with spam filter; future updates anticipated
Implemented badge display on own mod profile
Introduced macro speed slider for customizable macro execution speed
Implemented Gallery Tab with screenshot saving functionality via keypress
Enhanced chat features: added text color options and adjustable transparency for background and text
Improvements: Completed a comprehensive rework of the menu
Added maximum message count limit for chat to prevent overflow
Improved skin and virus replacement mechanisms
Disallowed simultaneous multiple line splits to avoid processing issues
Removed FPS-related features and moved them to the game tab
Replaced 'WebSocket.prototype.send' with 'SigWsHandler' for handling the Sigmally WebSocket
Bug Fixes: Resolved issues with stop movement in both vertical and horizontal directions
Modified chat functionality to split words instead of characters
Fixed issues with shortened names handling
Fixed global variables: friends_settings and friends_names
Fixed one split for mouse macros.
Chat issue fixed. This fixed the respawn key & sending chat messages.

Improvements: Themes are now applied to every game modal.
Bug Fixes: Fixed Map, outline/border, food and cell color pickers.
Fixed hiding food when using SigFixes.
Fixed real-time updates with SigFixes for color pickers. Transparency for the color pickers will not work when using SigFixes.
